Road Works Notice

July 7, 2024 • Vis Municipality

The main road between Vis Town and Komiža will be closed for essential maintenance work.

Duration

Today until 18:00

Affected Area

Main road from Vis center to Komiža junction

Alternative Routes

  • Use the coastal road via Rukavac
  • Local bus service will follow alternative routes
  • Ferry schedule remains unchanged

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. For urgent matters, please contact the municipal office.
